subject: VPN not connecting from home office
body:
Hi IT Support,

I've been unable to connect to the company VPN since this morning. I've tried restarting my laptop and router but still getting a 'connection timed out' error. I need access to the internal systems for a client meeting at 2pm today.

Please help ASAP.

Thanks,
John

subject: New hire starting Monday - Sarah Johnson
body:
Hello IT Team,

We have a new employee starting next Monday:

Name: Sarah Johnson
Department: Marketing
Role: Marketing Analyst
Start Date: February 17, 2026

She will need:
- Laptop setup
- Email account
- Access to Salesforce and HubSpot
- Badge access to Building B

Please have everything ready by Friday.

Thank you,
HR

subject: Need to reset my password
body:
Hi,

I forgot my password and I'm locked out of my account. Can someone please reset it?

My username is lchen@company.com

Thank you,
Lisa

subject: Question about IT policies
body:
Hey team,

I had a couple questions:

1. What's the policy on using personal devices for work email?
2. Are we allowed to install third-party software on company laptops?
3. Who do I talk to about getting a second monitor?

Thanks,
Mike

subject: Wi-Fi keeps dropping in conference room 3B
body:
Hi IT,

The Wi-Fi in conference room 3B on the second floor has been extremely unreliable this week. It drops every 10-15 minutes during meetings. Multiple people have reported this issue.

This is affecting our ability to do video calls with clients. Can someone look into it?

Thanks,
Anna
